name: Gold Miner In Land - Gold Miner free game - free gold miner adventure game
name_original: Gold Miner In Land - Gold Miner free game - free gold miner adventure game
description:
Gold Miner can't find gold in the see now.So he have to come to the Gold Hill to find gold.The reason why there are many gold left in the Gold Hill is there are many ferocious monster.Many prospectors afraid to come.The golden master have to come for ther lives.Now he comes here and will fight with the monster,the trap etc.Let's fight with them.
This game,the art is nice.And there are many lovely mobs,institutions,etc.Anyway it is well worth a play.
